alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 4:31AM CDT until May 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 430 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bartlett, or 23 miles northeast of Ord, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Four Corners and Cumminsville. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 137 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
